Pre-Game Insights: India and Syria will play for the Intercontinental Cup 2024 trophy
Syria holds a slight advantage as they only need a draw to claim the trophy
India have not won a game since November 2023
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be telecast on Sports 18 3 and streamed live on JioCinema
The match will take place at the GMC Balayogi Athletic Stadium in Hyderabad
Others: India began the competition with a 0-0 draw against Mauritius
Syria beat Mauritius 2-0 in their opening game
India's head coach Manolo Márquez celebrated his 56th birthday on Saturday
Syria's head coach José Lana is satisfied with their opening-game display against Mauritius
